'http://should.not.be.removed' // hue
"http://should.not.be.removed"
'https://should.not.be.removed'
"https://should.not.be.removed"
'//should.not.be.removed'
"//should.not.be.removed"
{
    foo://should.be.removed
    lala:"//should.not.be.removed"
    haja:"//should.not.be.removed"//should be removed but ok if not
    lalala:"//should.not.be.removed",//should be removed
    yolo:"https://should.not.be.removed";//should be removed
    yolo:"http://should.not.be.removed";//should be removed
}
//should be removed
// should be removed
// http://should be removed
//http://should.be.removed
// https://should be removed
//https://should.be.removed
https://should.be.removed
http://should.be.removed
"yolo yolo yolo https://should.not.be.removed.but.ok.if.removed yolo yolo yolo"
"https://should.not.be.removed", "https://should.not.be.removed"
"https://should.not.be.removed", "//should.not.be.removed" //shoud be removed
"https://should.not.be.removed", "//should.not.be.removed"
'https://should.not.be.removed', '//should.not.be.removed'
"https://shoud.not.be.removed" //shoud be removed"
